klein2007.notes: Pre-mortem technique for identifying project risks; prospective hindsight increases issue identification by 30%

schoemaker1995.title: Scenario planning: A tool for strategic thinking
schoemaker1995.notes: Seminal paper on scenario planning methodology; W4-5 reading on designing for uncertain futures. SMR articles from this era lack DOIs; a reprint in Long Range Planning exists but is not the original.

stewartrigg2011.formatted_reference: Stewart, J., & Rigg, C. (2011). *Learning and Talent Development*. CIPD - Kogan Page.
stewartrigg2011.title: Learning and Talent Development
stewartrigg2011.notes: CIPD Level 7 textbook on learning and development; cited for definitions of professionalism

paulusyang2000.formatted_reference: Paulus, P. B., & Yang, H. C. (2000). Idea generation in groups: A basis for creativity in organizations. *Organizational Behavior and Human Decision Processes*, *82*(1), 76–87.
paulusyang2000.title: Idea generation in groups: A basis for creativity in organizations
paulusyang2000.journal: Organizational Behavior and Human Decision Processes
paulusyang2000.notes: Brainwriting outperforms traditional brainstorming; W4-5 reading on creative problem-solving techniques
